title: job desc covrzy
value:
Bangalore
Architected and optimized AWS infrastructure for Travel APIs, achieving 99.9% uptime, averaging less than 200ms
response time, and handling 600k monthly bookings.
 Integrated Slack webhooks across all products ( Health, Liability ) to enable zero delay client request routing to
the sales team, reducing response time from 24 hours to 1 hour.
Developed scalable and maintainable web applications using Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and React.js,
ensuring efficiency and user-focused design. This contributed to more than 966K impressions and 12.6K+ clicks
within 5 months
